feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
